sql-case.value: ALTER TYPE compfoo1 OWNER TO usr1
ALTER TYPE compfoo RENAME TO compfoo1;
ALTER TYPE compfoo1 SET SCHEMA usr1;
ALTER TYPE usr1.compfoo1 ADD ATTRIBUTE f3 int;
ALTER TYPE bugstatus ADD VALUE IF NOT EXISTS 'regress' BEFORE 'closed';
ALTER TYPE bugstatus RENAME VALUE 'create' TO 'new';
ALTER TYPE type_name
ALTER TYPE schema_name.type_name
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE DEBUG REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE SPECIFICATION REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE BODY REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE bool_variable = TRUE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE bool_variable = FALSE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE string_variable = 'String Value' REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = +5 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = -5 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = +5.0 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = -5.0 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE hex_variable = X'11' REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, STATIC FUNCTION p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER PROCEDURE p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, STATIC PROCEDURE p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, STATIC PROCEDURE p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME STRING_)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, STATIC PROCEDURE p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME STRING_)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, OVERRIDING STATIC FUNCTION p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, FINAL STATIC FUNCTION p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, INSTANTIABLE STATIC FUNCTION p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, NOT INSTANTIABLE STATIC FUNCTION p(c1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
